summary: Automate and version telemetry quilt exports (JSON/CSV) with checksums and CI hooks.

directives.details: Integrate export generation into the rollup pipeline (e.g., tools/telemetry/quilt_loom.py) supporting a --export flag; regenerate exports alongside rollups.
Emit schema_version '1.0'; add exports/README.md with sensitivity label, retention, cadence, and usage. Include build_info.json (commit, timestamp, params).
Write composite_export.json.sha256 and composite_export.csv.sha256 to verify artifact integrity.
On push to main, run export regeneration and checksum verification (skip allowed for docs-only changes). Document the workflow in README.md.
Submit acknowledgement and factory report summarizing automation status, schema version, artifact paths, and checksums to exchange/reports/inbox/order-2025-10-14-012-report.json.
